channel.title: CVE Feed for SonicWall -- Email Security Appliance
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SonicWall -- Email Security Appliance

item.title: CVE-2019-7489|2024-08-04T20:54:27.817Z -- sonicwall -- email%20security%20appliance
item.description: A vulnerability in SonicWall Email Security appliance allow an unauthenticated user to perform remote code execution. This vulnerability affected Email Security Appliance version 10.0.2 and earlier.

item.title: CVE-2019-7488|2024-08-04T20:54:27.831Z -- sonicwall -- email%20security%20appliance
item.description: Weak default password cause vulnerability in SonicWall Email Security appliance which leads to attacker gain access to appliance database. This vulnerability affected Email Security Appliance version 10.0.2 and earlier.
